discussion.content:
https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/1213/wls/WJCOM/overview.htm#WJCOM112
I think the correct one is the C

questions.question_text:
You are working for a software company that mostly dealt with creating and reusing C++ and .NET objects. There are many COM (Component Object Model) components that have been created over time that provide standardized functionalities. Recently, platform independence has become a major consideration for your organization and you have deployed WebLogic Server12c. But you would like to make use of some of your prebuilt COM objects for request processing. You need an interim solution before implementing web services.
Which artifact within WebLogic Server helps you achieve your objective?

choices.B: MyClass must be available in the WebLogic Server's classpath.
choices.C: MyClass can be targeted to only one server instance.
choices.A: MyClass can be specified in the Configuration Wizard as a shutdown class.
choices.D: MyClass must not have a main method.

questions.question_text:
You created a shutdown class MyClass that you would like to execute just before server shutdown.
Which statement is true regarding MyClass?

choices.C: Use the Administration Console to add a new network channel to the cluster.
choices.D: Use the Administration Console to clone an existing server in the cluster.
choices.A: Use the Configuration Wizard to add a new server to the cluster.
choices.B: Use pack and unpack to copy an existing server in the cluster.

questions.question_text:
Consider an existing nondynamic cluster that is currently hosting many libraries, applications, and data sources. You need to scale out this cluster to include a new server. You provision the domain on a new machine.
What are the two ways to create this new server in the domain configuration? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Drag each metric onto two charts in the same view.

questions.question_text:
As part of troubleshooting an application, you need to analyze the HTTP session count and the server heap size over the past six hours. You are using the
Administration Console. You want to view both metrics together and correlate their values.
Which three steps should you take in the Administration Console? (Choose three.)
Which session persistence type is invalid?
